enhanced_by.reason: The method clearChangedCache() is invoked to reset cached results, ensuring that the state is updated after setting readOnly.
Setting the context is often required before setting readOnly to ensure the context is correctly initialized.
The method getReadOnly() can be used to verify the state of the readOnly property after it has been set.
The method isChanged() can be used to check if any changes, including the readOnly property, have been detected.
